Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.extensibility.IMatchChecker
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.extensibility.IQuerySpecificationProvider
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.IncQueryEngineManager.createAdvancedIncQueryEngine(Notifier)
    use AdvancedIncQueryEngine.createUnmanagedEngine(Notifier)
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.evm.api.EventDrivenVM.createIncQueryExecutionSchema(IncQueryEngine, Scheduler.ISchedulerFactory)
    Use ExecutionSchemas#createIncQueryExecutionSchema(IncQueryEngine,ISchedulerFactory) instead
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.evm.api.EventDrivenVM.createIncQueryExecutionSchema(IncQueryEngine, Scheduler.ISchedulerFactory, Set<RuleSpecification<?>>)
    Use ExecutionSchemas#createIncQueryExecutionSchema(IncQueryEngine,ISchedulerFactory,Set) instead
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.evm.api.EventDrivenVM.createIncQueryRuleEngine(IncQueryEngine)
    Use RuleEngines.createIncQueryRuleEngine(IncQueryEngine) instead
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.evm.api.EventDrivenVM.createIncQueryRuleEngine(IncQueryEngine, Set<RuleSpecification<?>>)
    Use RuleEngines#createIncQueryRuleEngine(IncQueryEngine,Set) instead
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.IncQueryEngineManager.disposeEngine(Notifier)
    use engine.dispose() instead
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.extensibility.IMatchChecker.evaluateXExpression(Tuple, Map<String, Integer>)
    org.eclipse.incquery.databinding.runtime.util.DatabindingUtil.getDatabindingAdapter(Pattern)
    "Use DatabindingUtil.getDatabindingAdapter(IQuerySpecification) instead"
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.evm.specific.Schedulers.getIQBaseSchedulerFactory(IncQueryEngine)
    Change parameter to NavigationHelper (e.g. engine.getBaseIndex()) or use getIQEngineSchedulerFactory
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.IQuerySpecification.getMatcher(Notifier)
    use IQuerySpecification.getMatcher(IncQueryEngine) instead, e.g. in conjunction with IncQueryEngine.on(Notifier).
    org.eclipse.incquery.databinding.runtime.adapter.DatabindingAdapterUtil.getObservableValue(IPatternMatch, String)
    Use IncQueryObservables.getObservableValue(IPatternMatch,String) instead
    org.eclipse.incquery.patternlanguage.emf.eMFPatternLanguage.impl.EMFPatternLanguageFactoryImpl.getPackage() 
    org.eclipse.incquery.patternlanguage.patternLanguage.impl.PatternLanguageFactoryImpl.getPackage() 
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.base.itc.igraph.ITcDataSource.getReachabilityPath(V, V)
    Use ITcDataSource.getPathFinder() instead
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.evm.api.RuleEngine.getRuleSpecifications()
    use the RuleEngine.getRuleSpecificationMultimap() instead as it returns the filter configurations as well
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.IncQueryMatcher.newDeltaMonitor(boolean)
    use the Databinding API through IncQueryObservables in org.eclipse.incquery.databinding.runtime, or the advanced features available in AdvancedIncQueryEngine!
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.impl.BaseMatcher.newDeltaMonitor(boolean)
    use IMatchUpdateListener or EVM instead!
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.IncQueryMatcher.newFilteredDeltaMonitor(boolean, Match)
    use the Databinding API through IncQueryObservables in org.eclipse.incquery.databinding.runtime, or the advanced features available in AdvancedIncQueryEngine!
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.impl.BaseMatcher.newFilteredDeltaMonitor(boolean, Match)
    use IMatchUpdateListener or EVM instead!
    org.eclipse.incquery.databinding.runtime.adapter.DatabindingAdapterUtil.observeAllAttributes(IValueChangeListener, Object)
    Use IncQueryObservables.observeAllAttributes(IValueChangeListener,Object) instead
    org.eclipse.incquery.databinding.runtime.adapter.DatabindingAdapterUtil.observeFeatures(IPatternMatch, IValueChangeListener, String)
    Use IncQueryObservables.observeFeatures(IPatternMatch,IValueChangeListener,String) instead
    org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.IQueryGroup.prepare(Notifier)
    use instead, e.g. in conjunction with {@link IncQueryEngine#on(Notifier)}
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.eclipse.incquery.patternlanguage.emf.specification.GenericPatternMatcher(Pattern, IncQueryEngine)
    use #on(Pattern, IncQueryEngine) instead.
    org.eclipse.incquery.patternlanguage.emf.specification.GenericPatternMatcher(Pattern, Notifier)
    use #on(Pattern, IncQueryEngine) instead, e.g. in conjunction with IncQueryEngine.on(Notifier)
